document.full_text: george hill has become a productive role player by reining in his game, but gregg popovich and the spurs need hill to tap into his strengths as an unbridled scorer.
document.title: george hill and the green light
lines_and_colors: george hill has become a productive role player by reining in his game, but gregg popovich and the spurs need hill to tap into his strengths as an unbridled scorer.
